title: Open Channel Management - SluiceGate
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic Sluice Gate made for Open Channel Management (raw-water systems).

gateType.description: Property. Enum:'Sluice Gate'. The type of the gate.

gateWidth.description: Property. The width of the sluice gate. Units: 'meters'

gateOpening.description: Property. The height of gate opening. Units: ['meters', 'percentage']

gateBottomElevation.description: Property. Elevation of the bottom (crest) of the gate

gateDischargeCoefficient.description: Property. Gate discharge coefficient (m0.5/s) that accounts for energy losses as water passes under the gate

orificeDischargeCoefficient.description: Property. Orifice discharge coefficient (m0.5/s) that accounts for energy losses as water passes under the gate and the downstream tailwater increases to the point at which the gate is no longer flowing freely (downstream submergence is causing a greater upstream headwater for a given flow)

waterDischarge.description: Property. The discharge that passes the weir (Q)

headDifference.description: Property. The difference between the upstream depth and the depth just downstream

flowType.description: Property. Enum:'Overflow, Free-Flow, Submerged Flow'. It defines the flow conditions in the gate. It takes the values: 'Overflow' (upstream water level exceeds the weir crest level), 'Free-Flow' (water level is lower than gate edge), 'Submerged Flow' (the rate of flow passing through the gate is regulated by the opening of the gate)

upstreamEndControlPoint.description: Relationship. A relationship indicating the ID of the cross section just upstream of the sluice gate

downsreamEndControlPoint.description: Relationship. A relationship indicating the ID of the cross section just downstream of the sluice gate

upstreamControlPoint.description: Relationship. A relationship indicating the ID of the cross section in a distance where the flow conditions are permanent, upstream of the sluice gate

downsreamControlPoint.description: A relationship indicating the ID of the cross section in a distance where the flow conditions are permanent, downstream of the sluice gate

curveDischargeCoefficient.description: Relationship. The URI of the OpenChannelCurve that represents the discharge Coefficient as a function of relative weir opening (weir opening over upstream depth), Cd over a/H1
